DLG ITM_7

DLG SPR_0
Granny: Hey! How many time since you are the hale kukui? What? Don't you know what a hale kukui is? These young boys... There where I come from we call hale kukui the man who take cares of the lighthouse. Really! It's a person who is one with the ocean. Loooong nights, loooong days. Everything for a marriage with the big, big ocean. Romantic, right? 

DLG ITM_0
You found a nice warm cup of tea

DLG ITM_1
It's another day near the sea

DLG ITM_2
Loooong nights, loooong days. The granny was right. Sometimes too long. 

DLG ITM_3
I just can't forget... even if I 'm at the end of the world. Ran away? Absolutely NOT! What can I do? 

DLG ITM_4
This photograph is when we travelled to Brazil... There isn't a day on which I didn't think about you, guys. The laughs, the beers in front of the moon, the white sand, the coconuts... Why had I chosen this loneliness? Why? 

DLG ITM_5
Maybe my heart needs this. This loneliness... these feelings. Start to feel again. Be one... with me. 

DLG ITM_6
[THE END]

DLG ITM_7
Why didn't I hear my body before? It was such an easy thing... Well, now I know what I need to do with myself, how I have to take care of my self. What I want for my future? I don't know. Just another day near the sea. 

VAR a
42
